languages.text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.
languages.original_text: Расплавленная порода источает чудовищный жар. Поверхность пузырится и издает едва слышное шипение, словно магма испепеляет сам воздух.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Это природная магма, глубоко же механикусы докопались
The molten slag is emitting tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if magma was incinerating the very air you breathe.
The molten slag is emitting tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if magma was incinerating the very air you breathe.
The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.
The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.
The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

languages.text: Расплавленная порода источает чудовищный жар. Поверхность пузырится и издает едва слышное шипение, словно магма испепеляет сам воздух.
熔化的岩石正在散发着巨大的热量。它的表面冒着气泡，发出轻微的嘶嘶声，仿佛岩浆正在焚烧着你呼吸的空气。
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: 熔化的岩石正在散发着巨大的热量。它的表面冒着气泡，发出轻微的嘶嘶声，仿佛岩浆正在焚烧着你呼吸的空气。

languages.text: La roca fundida desprende un calor tremendo. La superficie burbujea y sisea suavemente, como si el magma quemara el mismo aire que respiras.
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: La roca fundida desprende un calor tremendo. La superficie burbujea y sisea suavemente, como si el magma quemara el mismo aire que respiras.

languages.text: 溶けた岩は凄まじい熱を放っている。表面はブクブク煮立ち、少しシューッと音を立てて、呼吸するまさにそこでマグマが焦げているようだ。
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: 溶けた岩は凄まじい熱を放っている。表面はブクブク煮立ち、少しシューッと音を立てて、呼吸するまさにそこでマグマが焦げているようだ。

languages.text: Der geschmolzene Fels strahlt enorme Hitze ab. Die Oberfläche wirft Blasen und zischt leise, als würde das Magma die Luft entzünden, die du atmest.
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: Der geschmolzene Fels strahlt enorme Hitze ab. Die Oberfläche wirft Blasen und zischt leise, als würde das Magma die Luft entzünden, die du atmest.

languages.text: La roche en fusion diffuse une chaleur suffocante, accentuée par les bulles qui éclatent régulièrement à la surface. Un étrange sifflement emplit l'air, comme si le magma incinérait l'air que vous respirez.
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: La roche en fusion diffuse une chaleur suffocante, accentuée par les bulles qui éclatent régulièrement à la surface. Un étrange sifflement emplit l'air, comme si le magma incinérait l'air que vous respirez.

languages.text: Erimiş kayadan katlanılmaz bir sıcaklık yayılıyor. Yüzey köpürüyor, tıslamayı andıran bir ses yükseliyor. Magma, soluduğun havayı kavuruyormuş izlenimi uyandırıyor.
languages.original_text: The molten rock is radiating tremendous heat. The surface bubbles and hisses softly as if the magma were incinerating the very air you breathe.

traits.locale_text: Erimiş kayadan katlanılmaz bir sıcaklık yayılıyor. Yüzey köpürüyor, tıslamayı andıran bir ses yükseliyor. Magma, soluduğun havayı kavuruyormuş izlenimi uyandırıyor.
